package.name: qtmoko-frozen-bubble
package.title: Frozen Bubble
package.summary: Cool game where you pop out the bubbles!

details.p: Frozen-Bubble is a clone of the popular "Puzzle Bobble" game, in which you attempt to shoot bubbles into groups of the same color to cause them to pop. It features 100 single-player levels, a two-player mode, music and striking graphics.
This game is widely rumored to be responsible for delaying the Woody release.
